title: Bffs Spring Break Fashionista
description: Welcome to the Bffs Spring Break Fashionista. Spring break is here. Barbie and their friends are can’t wait to have some fun together. They’ve been waiting for the spring break since the beginning of the year. Help them prepare their spring break outfits! They can finally wear skirts and dresses since it’s really warm outside now, so make sure to create a cute look! Have fun!
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Strike Breakout
description: Strike Breakout is an intense rescue mission game where you're part of a specialized team sent to save the President and his security officers. You ride shotgun with a skilled helicopter pilot as you embark on a series of 10 nail-biting missions. Each mission drops you into enemy territory where you must stealthily navigate through enemy defenses, neutralize threats, and rescue the hostages.
instructions: - Left Mouse to Shot - Right Mouse button for Scope - E to Pick UP and rescue - 1,2,3,4,5 to change weapon

title: Puppy Merge
description: Puppy Merge is a unique merge game where you must grab and combine identical puppies to create a new and bigger one. Puppies will fall automatically into the arena; what you must do is drag the puppies around and merge them into identical ones. Don't let the puppies fall outside the box, or the game will end. You can try to catch the puppy and bring it back to the arena if the puppy falls.
instructions: Drag the left mouse button to move the puppies.

title: Jump In To The Plane
description: Want to feel like a super agent? Jump into a plane with your car! Race against time, perform crazy stunts, and wreak havoc in this insane game. Buckle up and put the pedal to the metal! Explore dozens of locations and vehicles. One wrong move and you're gone! Hurry, you've got a plane to catch!
instructions: Use the Mouse button to launch and control the boost.

title: Fury of the Steampunk Princess
description: Welcome to the world of the future, where style and survival go hand in hand. Help the girl create unique outfits that combine elements of post-apocalyptic chaos and steampunk technology. From armored corsets to steam accessories - the possibilities for customizing clothes in the game are extensive. Get a boost of energy for creativity and self-expression in a world where, even after the end of the world, style remains important for survival!
instructions: Together with the main character, we are transported to the post-apocalyptic world of the future. We help the girl to adapt to this world and find her place in it. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Merge Hero - Survival Tower Defense
description: Play Merge Hero - Survival Tower Defense online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Best Classic Freecell Solitaire
description: Welcome to FreeCell Solitaire! Dive into this classic card game where strategy and patience are key. With all cards visible from the start, plan your moves carefully to arrange them into the foundation piles by suit, from Ace to King. Use the free cells wisely to maneuver your way out of tight spots. Are you ready to tackle the challenge and clear the board? Play the Best Classic FreeCell Solitaire now and put your skills to the test!
instructions: The goal of the game is to move all of the cards onto the output stacks, starting with the ace of each suit and placing them in rising order from there. A card can only be moved onto another higher card if its rank is one higher and if it's of the opposite color. Blacks on reds and vice versa. Cards may also be placed in one of the four available FreeCells if not already occupied.

title: Flames & Fortune
description: Dive into "Flames & Fortune," a game inspired by Card Crawl, set in treacherous dungeons. Play as the Pyro-Paladin, mastering a deck of 54 cards to battle foes like goblins and dragons. Strategy determines survival and success brings gold to unlock new skills. Will you conquer the darkness for untold riches?
instructions: Draw cards using resources to defeat your enemies until there are no cards left in the deck. Each turn, new cards will be drawn until the 4 slots on the dashboard are filled. Equip the resource cards in your hands and backpack. Confront your enemies by casting spells at them, taking direct damage from them, or dampening it with a shield. Gather as many treasures as possible on your way out of the dungeon, and use the earned gold to unlock new Ability Cards.

title: Extreme Car Race Master 3D
description: Fine tune your ride, keep your foot on the gas, dodge the endlessly varied obstacles, and try to keep out the way of your equally manic rivals in super-fast, super-exciting, psychedelic races that always offer something new and unexpected. Feel the need for speed?
instructions: USE Arrows keys for player movement.

title: Hyper Cars Ramp Crash
description: "Hyper Cars Ramp Crash" is a 3D stunt and crash simulation game with realistic physics and graphics. You can perform incredible stunts in many different modes with great looking cars. 7 different super-sport car models are waiting in the garage for you to try them. Open world, stunt modes and fall mode can be played in 1-player and 2-player modes.
instructions: If playing single: Move: "W,A,S,D" or "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "L-SHIFT" Restart car position: "R" Change camera view: "C" If playing two player: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" NOS: "L-SHIFT" Restart car position: "R" Change camera view: "C" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "N" Restart car position: "L" Change camera view: "U"

title: Match Master
description: Match them all! Match all same pairs in the given time to win the game and earn coins. Use various powerups to match them faster. Spen your coins to decorate your house and unlock new houses.
instructions: Find identical pairs of objects and drag them into the round hatch to make them disappear. Clear the rubble and earn coins!

title: Digital Circus IO
description: Grim AI gathered amazing creatures at the circus arena and offered them the chance to compete for life here! Pick your character and get as much territory as you can! Run from your starting territory and return to add a chunk of space. Evade other characters or defeat them by stepping on their trail.
instructions: On mobiles - tap the screen, and your character will move in this direction. On the desktop, move your mouse how you want the character to move, or use WASD / arrow keys on the keyboard.

title: VSCO Girl Aesthetic
description: Welcome to the VSCO Girl Aesthetic. Rainbow High school girls Sunny, Skyler, Ruby, and Violet are the trendy fashion girls. They planned to try VSCO fashion which is trending all over social media. Join and browse their wardrobe to pick some suitable outfits for the girls. Play and Have fun!
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Basketball Damage
description: Basketball bounce is an addictive endless basketball game. You can control the ball as you like. Time your tapping perfectly to score before the clock runs out. Keep going as long as you can!
instructions: press A or D= move left or right

title: Dreamy Jewel
description: If you put three or more jewel of thesame type together vertically or horizontally, they'll disappear! Special blocks appear when four or more are aligned and erased. Mixing effects when special blocks are crossed with each other!
instructions: Swipe to move the jewel.

title: Tropical Match
description: Embark on a vibrant adventure in Tropical Match 3! Help Coco, your lively island guide, find fruits and other island gems in a tropical paradise. Match exotic fruits, uncover vibrant flowers and observe colourful exotic birds while enjoying the island adventure. The game features exciting levels and a relaxing island soundtrack! So what are you waiting for? Enjoy the tropical paradise adventure now!
instructions: Tap or click to swap tropical treasures. Line up three or more of the same type to clear them. Create larger combos for spectacular bonuses. Progress through levels to enhance the beauty and vibrancy of your tropical escape!

title: Gym Muscle Merge Tycoon
description: Gym Muscle: Merge Tycoon is an addictive game where you create your team of fighters and transform them into real muscle heroes. Connect fighters to strengthen their muscle mass, improve their characteristics, and earn profit. Participate in fighting tournaments to compete for cool rewards and become the most powerful fighter of all time!
instructions: - Merge 2 similar fighters to become a stronger fighter. - Click to speed up the appearance of fighters - Each fighter after a certain period will automatically earn a certain amount of money - Use the money you earn to upgrade your fighter, helping you become the strongest faster - Win the boxing tournament to get even more rewards

title: Type Sprint
description: Are you good at typing on the keyboard or mobile? Type Sprint is both a running racing game and a typing relaxation game with 3D stickman players. It is managed for you to type fast to make platforms for your character to run forward as the first three. I think typing on PC is easier than it on mobile. Good luck and have fun!
instructions: keyboard, letters

title: Lucky Vegas Blackjack
description: Enter the Lucky Vegas casino and unwind with a game of blackjack. Calculate the chances of winning and make split-second decisions, that will help you win against your opponents.
instructions: Gather cards to have a higher value amount than the casino without going over number 21. Choose between playing against three bots or choose to play from three hands as a local multiplayer.

title: Merge Sesame
description: This is a game anyone can easily learn and enjoy with the whole family! With addictive sound effects and feedback, complete consecutive combos to relieve stress! If you hit a high combo with an object, your score will soar! There are no penalties or time limits, which means you can enjoy the game at your own pace. If you are looking for wonderful combination effects that are pleasing to the eye, join this game and challenge for the best score.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Car Stunt Racing 3D
description: Car Stunt Racing 3D is a fun racing game. Open this incredibly entertaining car racing mobile game and prepare yourself to engage in all kinds of thrilling races. Place your fingers on the ground and get ready for the unexpected. You will never know what you will encounter when making your next turn. Collect energy and money, evade opponents, and join us to experience the thrill of speed and excitement! We wish you a joyful gameplay experience!
instructions: AD or tap to move

title: Off Road Overdrive
description: Off Road Overdrive plays like a side-scrolling car-balanced game with 2D cartoon vehicles. Let me introduce the game modes for you!If you want to make a perfect record, play Challenge mode with different terrains again and again including Snow, Beachwear, Field, Desert, and Dark Night. Even the 2D platform will test your driving skills and balance abilities!
instructions: As a traditional car racing game, you can operate a vehicle with 2 buttons to keep it steady on the platform.

title: Mahjong Connect Gold
description: Mahjong Connect Gold is an exciting puzzle game with captivating gameplay that is known to all fans of the Mahjong series. Collect all the tiles by matching their pairs according to the rules of classic Mahjong. Immerse yourself in Mahjong's unique world and dive into this captivating puzzle's depths!
instructions: The rules of the game are like in classic Mahjong, and playing is easy: - Click on two identical tiles. They will disappear if the selected pair can be connected by three lines (or fewer). - To pass the level, you must clear all identical tiles this way.

title: Seat Jam 3D
description: Play Seat Jam 3D online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: BUBBLE FEVER BLAST
description: Shoot the bubble at bubbles of the same color to drop them! When the bubble enters STAR, there is a chance for FEVER! If the bubbles reach the bottom line, the game is over.
instructions: Drag to aim, drop to shoot.

title: Moto Stunt Biker
description: More than twenty-four thrilling levels await you in Moto Stunt Biker, an adrenaline-pumping motocross game. Choose from four enthralling motorbike designs as you unlock them. In each level, you'll encounter new obstacles while earning cash to purchase and improve your motorcycles. Fans of racing and adrenaline seeking will like its captivating gameplay and colorful cartoon graphics. Get your heart racing because you're in for some wild races and daring exploits.
instructions: Use the controls to guide your motorbike to the finish line. Move to maintain balance, and speed up or slow down as needed to survive each obstacle. Controls Use WASD or Arrow keys to move Use Shift to use Nitro

title: Zombie Mission Survivor
description: The zombies and variant creatures are coming over you in waves. It is time to defend yourself in this game! The heroes are armed with weapons but they need to improve them by earning some gold from the zombie destruction. Upgrade your armories, weapons, and earnings on each round and make your defense stronger. Play with your friend and defend your lands against the zombies together by 2 player game mode. Let the action begin!
instructions: Player 1: Move: W, A, S, D Upgrades: Z, X, C Player 2: Move: ARROW KEYS Upgrades: B, N, M

title: Assassin Commando Car Driving
description: Assassin Commando Car Driving is a vertical-version car battle arcade game with 3D cartoon vehicles. Your car is equipped with a mechanic arm, a machine gun, and a baffle. You can crash enemy vehicles, punch them at the side, and shoot them when the machine gun skill is ready. I strongly suggest you upgrade the baffle first. Crashing the backside of the target is easier than attacking at the side.
instructions: Easy to operate the car with one button

title: Spider Solitaire
description: Experience Spider Solitaire, one of the popular single-player card games. Arrange cards in descending order and form complete sets of the same suit from King to Ace to remove them. The challenge is to organize two decks into eight tableau piles. With strategic thinking and skill, try to uncover all cards and complete the eight sets. There are varying difficulty levels based on the number of different suits (Diamonds, Spades, Hearts, Clubs) you choose to play with.
instructions: All cards of a sequence must be of the same suit. Each sequence must contain one card of each rank. The ranks in each sequence must be sorted and complete as follows: King, Queen, Jack, 10, 9, 8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2. You finish the sequence with an Ace

title: Barbiecore Aesthetics
description: Step into a whimsical world of pastel dreams and retro vibes with the Barbiecore Aesthetics dress-up game! Test your fashionista skills as you mix and match vibrant colors, fluffy textures, and vintage-inspired patterns to create the most stunning doll-like outfits. From quirky accessories to flouncy dresses, this game offers endless possibilities to express your style. Embrace the Barbiecore trend and let your creativity soar as you curate the perfect wardrobe for our beloved fashion icon.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

title: Aqua Blitz 2
description: Welcome to Aquablitz 2 - the newest iteration of the beloved underwater match-3 game that comes with fresh new graphics, a catchy tune and lots of improvements! Meet your new hostess, Pearl, the little mermaid. She will be pleased to guide you on your adventure through more than 700 splashy levels and teach you all the tricks you need to know to solve even the most complicated puzzles.
instructions: Match the gems and win the game!

title: Stack Sorting
description: Welcome to Stack Sorting! Your task is to organize colorful cylinders by clicking on stacks. Move the topmost cylinder to an empty stack or one with a matching top cylinder. Navigate through Easy Mode with plenty of stacks and time, or challenge yourself in Hard Mode with fewer stacks. Complete all levels within the time limit to emerge victorious!
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: The specimen zero
description: The moment has arrived to persevere in a hostile and mysterious environment. In the 3D horror game Specimen Zero, sick creatures creep across rooms, trying to murder you until you can find a way to escape. You are terrified, you have no idea where you are, and your last memory is of being abducted. However, an unusual and maybe hazardous event has taken place in that peculiar location. A means of evasion from such establishments must be found by you.
instructions: Find the keys to the doors, arm yourself with ammo and weapons, and make your way from chamber to room, all while evading the monsters. Controls: WASD Move Spacebar Jump F Interact R Reload Esc Menu

title: TicToc Braided Hairstyles
description: Do you want to get in on the coolest hairstyles out there? We've got a braided hair game that'll blow your mind. Meet our two main characters: Regina and Kiki. They're here to show you the hippest braids around—and Brian, the hairstylist who will create them, will tell you how it's done. Once you've got the perfect braid for your girl, customize it even more! And when you're done with the hair, dress your girl up in some cute clothes! This is your moment to shine, what are you waiting for?
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on desktops or tap to play on mobile devices.

title: Crazy Traffic Control
description: You control the traffic in the most realistic, craziest one-touch traffic game! Put your timing and skills to the test with: - realistic traffic - realistic acceleration   - realistic stopping times! - trains - cows - pedestrians Unbelievably absorbing and incredibly fun — clear the intersections with Crazy Traffic Control!
instructions: Click on the circles to controll the traffic, its super easy!

title: Princess Royal Wedding
description: Welcome to the princess Royal Wedding game. Princesses are getting ready for their wedding with Kristoff and Jack. They waiting so long for this occassion. They need some hand to get ready. Come and join the girls! And make this occassion most beautiful one in their life!
instructions: Left mouse button click

title: Block Team Deathmatch
description: Block Team Deathmatch is a first-person shooting simulation game. All models are made of pixel blocks including scenes, characters, and weapons. We have 4v4 Team Mode, Individual Mode, and Sniper Mode for you to select. If I were you, I would play the Team Mode first for better equipment, then challenge the other 2 modes when the rank levels up. If you never played any shooting games, I recommend you buy an auto-rifle to fight at any distance. Keep calm and shoot first!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Hyper Survive
description: Imagine you woke up to the apocalypse. The virus has infected the world and it's been one year since the zombie apocalypse began. Get ready for the terror, horror, survival, and fighting against zombies. Build your camp and survive the waves of zombies. Prepare yourself for a survival arcade game! Build your strategy and write your own story. Gather whatever you'll need to survive during this devastating period. No matter who you are, where you come from, and what you used to be before.
instructions: Hold and drag the mouse to control the character.

title: Curve Quest
description: Dodge obstacles hurdling towards your character while navigating through the curved tracks. Each collision with an obstacle diminishes your characters health, and if it depletes entirely, the game concludes. Throughout the course, numerous opportunities arise in the form of points, coins, and power-ups. As the player, seizing these rewards empowers you.
instructions: Click or tap to change directions. Avoid the obstacles.

title: Hidden Object Rooms Exploration
description: Explore a variety of rooms and find hidden items! With 18 levels and 6 items to discover in each room, enjoy the thrill of searching through different spaces like living rooms and more. Drag the screen to explore them. Get ready for an exciting adventure in 'Hidden Object Rooms Exploration'!
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Koi Fish Pond - Idle Merge Game
description: An addictive idle merging game. Build your own Koi fish company and grow your business. Release your Koi fishes into the pond and earn money every time they cross the finish line. Buy new Koi fishes (or collect them from the gift boxes), and merge the same level Koi fishes to upgrade into a new type. The higher-level of the Koi fishes, the more money you will earn. Use your earnings to buy upgrade packages in the Shop to help you make money faster!
instructions: Tap and drag to release your Koi fishes into the pond and earn money every time they cross the finish line. Tap on the fish in the tank to move it back. Drag and drop a fish on another one (of the same type) to merge them into a new/upgraded type. You can buy more tanks and additional fish-fairways in the Shop.

title: Celebrity Spring Fashion Trends
description: Welcome to Celebrity Spring Fashion Trends. Hello little girls. Are you ready for the latest spring fashion collection? Follow the latest fashion trends with these celebrities and create your own fashion clothes for next spring season. Browse their wardrobe to pick suitable outfits and costumes. Join and help them to welcome their favorite season.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click or Tap to play

title: Taxi Simulator 2024
description: Are you prepared to play an awesome simulator? Taxi Simulator 2024 is an online game set in an open environment with objectives to help you improve your cab driving abilities. Pick up the passengers and drive them to their destination, following the directions and exploring all of the maps to locate the streets and addresses. This game includes many game modes to keep you entertained; accomplish the stages in taxi or open mode, and freely explore the whole landscape.
instructions: Controls: WASD to move Click to move the camera C Camera Spacebar Jump Ctr to Run F Interact Esc Menu

title: Makeup Stack
description: Would you like to make up? How many cosmetic brands do you know? In this game, these questions will get the answers. Let's play Makeup Stack game to make up for the customers. You will pass the various doors that you can choose as you like. As long as you can complete the task, it doesn't matter what you choose. Let's try this game right now to make up more people!
instructions: Tap to start

title: Fire And Water Birds
description: Try to get the water and fire birds through challenging obstacles to get the highest score and become the master of the birds. a challenging adventure awaits you. Come on!
instructions: Keep the bird in the air and constantly press space/screen. Your goal is to hold out as long as possible, flying past obstacles and keeping the bird in flight.

title: ASMR Nail Treatment
description: Today's patient is dealing with thickening of the fingernails. Help her maintain good nail hygiene by providing proper nail care. Showcase your medical skills by performing this ASMR Nail Treatment game. Once the treatment is done, dress her in fashionable outfit and create captivating nail art using various styles and accessories.
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Celebrity Face Dance
description: «Celebrity Face Dance» - an exciting game for girls that combines makeup and dancing. Three celebrities await you, each with their unique style and image. Choose your favorite star and start creating a unique look for her. Use various cosmetic products to enhance beauty and individuality girls. Then, when the makeup is ready, move on to the most exciting part - the dance! Follow the instructions on the screen and mimic the celebrity's moves to become a true dance floor star!
instructions: Three girlfriends are planning to participate in a fashion trend - face dance. But this requires prior preparation. Help the girls do the right makeup; choose hairstyles, dresses and accessories together; and, of course, carefully rehearse the dance. The result can be saved as a PNG-image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Muscle Challenge
description: Run, eat healthy foods and proteins and avoid harmful foods, drinks and obstacles in the Muscle Challenge game! Defeat your enemies with the strength and muscular body you gained at the end of the race! The enemies get stronger in each level, so you have to get better too... If you want, you can also play the game in challenge mode with your friend in 2 Player mode.
instructions: Move the character left and right with "A,D" "Right-Left Arrow Keys" or "Mouse". You can use the "Mouse" or "Space" key to hit the boss.

title: Grow Wars.io
description: The battle between the heroes is beginning in the Grow Wars arena in this great io game! This battle is between the evolution heroes. Step into the arena and start slashing your opponents. Earn coins and buy new equipment or heroes in the shop. This battle can be played either single or 2 player. Call a friend and start playing together!
instructions: Player 1: Move: "W, A, S, D" Attack: "F" Dash: "G" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" Attack: "K" Dash: "L"

title: Taxi Driver Simulator
description: Taxi Driver Simulator offers an immersive experience behind the wheel of a taxi. Complete Work Mode’s 80 levels with 3 yellow stars to become an eligible taxi driver. Follow the blue direction indicators, pick up passengers, and deliver them to their destinations efficiently. Slow down before steering to save time. Don’t forget to buy the other 9 cars in the garage as you earn money! In Free mode, drive farther and pay for fuel at gas stations. Keep serving customers without advancing levels.
instructions: On PC Arrow keys = move Other functions = tap buttons on the screen On Mobile Tap buttons on the screen
